page.title: 03GIRLS CLOTHING
page.content: My name is Caroline Tailford.My hair is naturally curly.Some girls get their straight hair made curly.I wear a cotton nightie when I go to bed. During the day I wear jumpers,tank tops,and cardigans made of wool.I wear t-shirts,dresses,skirts and shorts made of cotton sometimes my shorts are made of towelling.My underwear (pants, petticoat) is made of cotton. My socks are made of nylon. I wear sandals and leather shoes.In winter I wear thick clothes and tights with over the knee socks.In rainy weather I put on wellingtons and in drier times I wear trainers. Once when I was a bridesmaid I wore a white coloured dress with flowers on it.The bride wore white too.
